nodes.name: mtrBOBS - Mod Editing Boots of Blinding Speed
nodes.summary: The only correct way of wearing Boots of Blinding Speed

nodes.name: mtrStateBasedMagicka - MWSE Mod providing State Based Magicka calculation based on Intelligence Willpower and Level
nodes.summary: A state-based magicka mod implemented in MWSE. Magicka is now calculated based on current intelligence, willpower and level.

nodes.name: mtrQuasiRadiantQuests - Mod adding repeatable radiant quests
nodes.summary: This mod adds very simple radiant quests for role-playing purposes. In version 0.1 there are only quests for alchemists.

nodes.name: mtrPermanentQuestCorpsesRandomizer OpenMW omwaddon - Randomizer for Location of Permanent Corpses of Imperial Taxman Processus Vitellius and Skooma Dealer Ernil Omoran Associated with Quests
nodes.summary: This mod randomizes placement of Processus Vitellius and Ernil Omoran bodies. Requires OpenMW.

nodes.name: mtrCultures - Role-Playing Mod allowing to choose your cultural background during character creation
nodes.summary: This mod adds character cultures that can be selected after character generation.

nodes.name: mtrQuests - Vanity and Alteration
nodes.summary: Simple quest mod that could have been a part of vanilla game. To start the quest ask patrons of Dagon Fel's tavern about latest rumors. Requires TR_Data.

nodes.name: mtrQuests - Blood and Faith
nodes.summary: Simple quest mod that could have been a part of vanilla game. To start the quest ask commoners about latest rumors after you reach level 5.

nodes.name: mtrLineage - Role-Playing Mod allowing to choose your Ancestors Lineage during Character Creation
nodes.summary: This mod adds many character lineages that can be selected after character generation.

nodes.name: mtrBalancedRaces - Another Race Mod
nodes.summary: Simple mod changing racial bonuses available in 3 versions - 1. Full, 2. With no skill changes 3. With no skill, weight and height changes

nodes.name: mtrDwemerPuzzleBoxRandomizer - Randomizer for Location of Dwemer Puzzle Box within Arkngthand associated with Main Quest
nodes.summary: This mod randomizes placement of Dwemer Puzzle Box. Made in regular mwscript, so it works in OpenMW too!

nodes.name: mtrDaedricOfferings - Daedra Lords Cultists and Worshippers can leave Offerings at Statues and Shrines in exchange for Restore Attributes Blessings and Cure Disease Blight or Poison
nodes.summary: Daedric statues now offer favors in exchange for offerings similarly to Imperial and Tribunal shrines.

nodes.name: mtrTribunalEraser - Mod Erasing Dark Brotherhood Attacks aswell as Mournhold and Almalexia added by Tribunal Expansion
mtrByTheDivines - Religion Role-Playing Mod allowing to choose Divines to Worship during Character Creation
nodes.summary: This mods adds a bunch of deities for player to choose from in a manner seen in Merlord's Character Backgrounds. Beliefs grant some simple abilities to the player, but it's mostly for purpose of role-playing. As such there are no

nodes.name: mtrPermanentQuestCorpsesRandomizer - Randomizer for Location of Permanent Corpses of Imperial Taxman Processus Vitellius and Skooma Dealer Ernil Omoran Associated with Quests
nodes.summary: This mod randomizes placement of Processus Vitellius and Ernil Omoran bodies. Requires mwse.
